title: Am I the only one who cannot stand Spring Day by BTS just because it makes me so sad and emotional? - Quora

response.answer_text: Theres a difference between not being able to stand a song and loving a song, though you cant listen to it as its to emotional. When a song evokes those sad feeling, then its good. Spring day even evokes sad emotions from one of the members when they sing it. Maybe the song brings out feelings that you are trying to keep bottled up. Its a beautiful song. At least you dont have to listen to it, though i there are, certain songs that i cant listen to, because of how they make me feel, but its not because i hate the song, its more like the pain i feel listening to a song and the message it conveys
